title: Shade in the Side of the Boundary Line
text: $$(0,0)$$ is not a solution to $$y<\frac{1}{3} x-\frac{4}{3}$$. Since $$(0,0)$$ is on the left side of the line, we shade the right side of the boundary line in red.\n##figure4.gif##
